# Elkhorn Hardwood

> Professional hardwood floor refinishing in Colorado Springs, CO. Locally owned since 2014. NWFA certified craftsmen with a 3-year finish warranty on every project.

## About
Elkhorn Hardwood is a locally owned hardwood floor refinishing company serving Colorado Springs and the Pikes Peak region. Founded in 2014, the company specializes in dustless sanding, custom staining, and commercial-grade finishing systems built for Colorado's high-altitude climate (6,035 ft elevation, low humidity, intense UV). NWFA certified, EPA Lead-Safe certified, BBB accredited. 500+ projects completed with a 4.9/5 average rating from 214+ reviews.

## Services
- **Whole-House Sand & Refinish**: $3–$8/sq ft. Complete sanding to bare wood with staining and multi-coat polyurethane finishing.
- **Dustless Floor Sanding**: $3.50–$5/sq ft. HEPA-filtered sanding captures 99% of dust. Critical at Colorado Springs' altitude where particles linger longer.
- **Custom Stain & Color Change**: $4–$9/sq ft. 40+ stain colors with on-site test patches on your actual floor.
- **Commercial Floor Refinishing**: $2.50–$6/sq ft. Gyms, restaurants, offices. After-hours and weekend scheduling available.
- **Hardwood Floor Repair**: $500–$2,000/project. Board replacement, water damage, gap filling, pet damage restoration.
- **Hardwood Floor Installation**: $6–$15/sq ft. Solid and engineered hardwood. Nail-down, glue-down, and floating methods.

## Service Areas
Colorado Springs, Broadmoor, Briargate, Old Colorado City, Rockrimmon, Manitou Springs, Falcon, Black Forest, Monument, Palmer Lake, Security-Widefield, Fountain, Woodland Park. All communities within a 30-mile radius of Colorado Springs.
